text:
Knife
sharpening activities of knifemen are an integral part of and indispensable to
the various butchering activities for which they are employed. The time so spent
is compensable under the FLSA.
html: Knife sharpening activities of knifemen are an integral part of and indispensable to the various butchering activities for which they are employed. The time so spent is compensable under the FLSA.
